name: Circles (itch) (digitalcookies)
description:
Controls:
-Space-bar to shoot

-Use the mouse to aim

How to Play:
If a red circle hits you or if you run out of time you lose.

If a blue circle hits the edge it will become red.

When a blue and red circle collide they are both destroyed.

Shoot blue circles at the red circles.

Destroy all the circles to win, you have 20 seconds!

Created for 20 Second Game Jam
